sn41:5.5.5_1: imassetaṁ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṁ mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammassa.
sn41:5.5.6_0: Rāgo kho, bhante, nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho.
sn41:5.5.7_0: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:5.5.11_0: Sā khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:5.5.13_0: Rāgo kho, bhante, bandhanaṁ, doso bandhanaṁ, moho bandhanaṁ.
sn41:5.5.14_0: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:5.5.16_0: Iti kho, bhante, yaṁ taṁ bhagavatā vuttaṁ:
sn41:5.7.1_0: Imassa kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn41:5.7.3_0: Yassa te gambhīre buddhavacane paññācakkhu kamatī”ti.
sn41:6.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā kāmabhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharati ambāṭakavane.
sn41:6.1.2_0: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā kāmabhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41:6.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ kāmabhuṁ etadavoca:
sn41:6.1.6_1: bhante”ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato kāmabhussa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā āyasmantaṁ kāmabhuṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn41:6.1.7_0: “katamo pana, bhante, kāyasaṅkhāro, katamo vacīsaṅkhāro, katamo cittasaṅkhāro”ti?
sn41:6.2.1_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho citto gahapati …pe… uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn41:6.2.2_3: kasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro”ti?
sn41:6.2.3_0: “Assāsapassāsā kho, gahapati, kāyikā. Ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā, tasmā assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro.
sn41:6.2.4_0: Pubbe kho, gahapati, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṁ bhindati, tasmā vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro.
sn41:6.2.5_0: Saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā. Ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā, tasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro”ti.
sn41:6.3.3_0: “Na kho, gahapati, saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjantassa bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
sn41:6.3.4_0: ‘ahaṁ saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjissan’ti vā ‘ahaṁ saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjāmī’ti vā ‘ahaṁ saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno’ti vā.
sn41:6.3.5_0: Atha khvassa pubbeva tathā cittaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti yaṁ taṁ tathattāya upanetī”ti.
sn41:6.5.3_1: mato kālaṅkato tassa kāyasaṅkhāro niruddho paṭippassaddho,
sn41:6.6.3_0: “Na kho, gahapati, saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhahantassa bhikkhuno evaṁ hoti:
sn41:6.6.5_0: Atha khvassa pubbeva tathā cittaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti, yaṁ taṁ tathattāya upanetī”ti.
sn41:6.8.2_0: “saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitaṁ pana, bhante, bhikkhuṁ kati phassā phusanti”?
sn41:6.8.3_0: “Saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitaṁ kho, gahapati, bhikkhuṁ tayo phassā phusanti—
sn41:6.8.4_0: suññato phasso, animitto phasso, appaṇihito phasso”ti.
sn41:6.9.3_1: bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāran”ti.
sn41:6.10.1_1: bhante”ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato kāmabhussa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā āyasmantaṁ kāmabhuṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn41:6.10.3_0: “Addhā kho tvaṁ, gahapati, yaṁ paṭhamaṁ pucchitabbaṁ taṁ pucchasi.
sn41:6.10.5_0: Saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā kho, gahapati, dve dhammā bahūpakārā—
sn41:7.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā godatto macchikāsaṇḍe viharati ambāṭakavane.
sn41:7.1.2_0: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā godatto tenupasaṅkami;
sn41:7.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ godattaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn41:7.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā godatto etadavoca:
sn41:7.1.3_5: ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānan”ti?
sn41:7.1.4_0: “Atthi, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca.
sn41:7.1.5_0: Atthi pana, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nānan”ti.
sn41:7.2.1_0: “Katamo ca, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca?
sn41:7.2.2_1: bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
sn41:7.2.2_5: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn41:7.2.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
sn41:7.2.5_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn41:7.4.2_0: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn41:7.5.2_0: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn41:7.5.4_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca.
sn41:7.6.1_0: Katamo ca, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṁ?
sn41:7.6.2_0: Rāgo, bhante, pamāṇakaraṇo, doso pamāṇakaraṇo, moho pamāṇakaraṇo.
sn41:7.6.3_0: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:7.6.4_0: Yāvatā kho, bhante, appamāṇā cetovimuttiyo, akuppā tāsaṁ cetovimutti aggamakkhāyati.
sn41:7.6.5_0: Sā kho pana akuppā cetovimutti suññā rāgena, suññā dosena, suññā mohena.
sn41:7.6.6_0: Rāgo kho, bhante, kiñcanaṁ, doso kiñcanaṁ, moho kiñcanaṁ.
sn41:7.6.7_0: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:7.6.8_0: Yāvatā kho, bhante, ākiñcaññā cetovimuttiyo, akuppā tāsaṁ cetovimutti aggamakkhāyati.
sn41:7.6.9_0: Sā kho pana akuppā cetovimutti suññā rāgena, suññā dosena, suññā mohena.
sn41:7.6.10_0: Rāgo kho, bhante, nimittakaraṇo, doso nimittakaraṇo, moho nimittakaraṇo.
sn41:7.6.11_0: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn41:7.6.12_0: Yāvatā kho, bhante, animittā cetovimuttiyo, akuppā tāsaṁ cetovimutti aggamakkhāyati.
sn41:7.6.13_0: Sā kho pana akuppā cetovimutti suññā rāgena, suññā dosena, suññā mohena.
sn41:7.6.14_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhante, pariyāyo yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nānan”ti.
sn41:7.6.16_0: Yassa te gambhīre buddhavacane paññācakkhu kamatī”ti.
sn41:8.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppatto hoti mahatiyā nigaṇṭhaparisāya saddhiṁ.
sn41:8.1.2_1: “nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppatto mahatiyā nigaṇṭhaparisāya saddhin”ti.
sn41:8.1.3_0: Atha kho citto gahapati sambahulehi upāsakehi saddhiṁ yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn41:8.1.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn41:8.1.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto etadavoca:
sn41:8.1.6_0: atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi, atthi vitakkavicārānaṁ nirodho”ti?
sn41:8.2.1_0: “Na khvāhaṁ ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi.
sn41:8.2.2_0: Atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi, atthi vitakkavicārānaṁ nirodho”ti.
sn41:8.2.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto ulloketvā etadavoca:
sn41:8.2.4_4: vātaṁ vā so jālena bādhetabbaṁ maññeyya,
sn41:8.2.4_6: sakamuṭṭhinā vā so gaṅgāya sotaṁ āvāretabbaṁ maññeyya,
sn41:8.3.2_0: katamaṁ nu kho paṇītataraṁ—ñāṇaṁ vā saddhā vā”ti?
sn41:8.3.4_2: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:8.3.6_0: Ahaṁ kho, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:8.3.7_0: Ahaṁ kho, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:8.3.8_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto kassa aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā saddhāya gamissāmi?
sn41:8.3.9_0: Atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi, atthi vitakkavicārānaṁ nirodho”ti.
sn41:8.4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sakaṁ parisaṁ apaloketvā etadavoca:
sn41:8.5.3_0: Idāneva ca pana mayaṁ, bhante, bhāsitaṁ:
sn41:8.5.5_0: Sace te, bhante, purimaṁ saccaṁ, pacchimaṁ te micchā.
sn41:8.5.6_0: Sace pana te, bhante, purimaṁ micchā, pacchimaṁ te saccaṁ.
sn41:8.5.7_0: Ime kho pana, bhante, dasa sahadhammikā pañhā āgacchanti.
sn41:8.5.8_0: Yadā nesaṁ atthaṁ ājāneyyāsi, atha maṁ paṭihareyyāsi saddhiṁ nigaṇṭhaparisāya.
sn41:8.5.9_0: Eko pañho, eko uddeso, ekaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ.
sn41:8.5.10_0: Dve pañhā, dve uddesā, dve veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.11_0: Tayo pañhā, tayo uddesā, tīṇi veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.12_0: Cattāro pañhā, cattāro uddesā, cattāri veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.13_0: Pañca pañhā, pañca uddesā, pañca veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.14_0: Cha pañhā, cha uddesā, cha veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.15_0: Satta pañhā, satta uddesā, satta veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.16_0: Aṭṭha pañhā, aṭṭha uddesā, aṭṭha veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.17_0: Nava pañhā, nava uddesā, nava veyyākaraṇāni.
sn41:8.5.18_0: Dasa pañhā, dasa uddesā, dasa veyyākaraṇānī”ti.
sn41:8.5.19_0: Atha kho citto gahapati nigaṇṭhaṁ nāṭaputtaṁ ime dasa sahadhammike pañhe āpucchitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
sn41:9.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena acelo kassapo macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppatto hoti cittassa gahapatino purāṇagihisahāyo.
sn41:9.1.2_0: Assosi kho citto gahapati: “acelo kira kassapo macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppatto amhākaṁ purāṇagihisahāyo”ti.
sn41:9.1.3_0: Atha kho citto gahapati yena acelo kassapo tenupasaṅkami;
sn41:9.1.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn41:9.1.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho citto gahapati acelaṁ kassapaṁ etadavoca:
sn41:9.1.7_1: tiṁsamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
sn41:9.1.8_1: tiṁsamattehi vassehi pabbajitassa natthi koci uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro,
sn41:9.1.8_2: aññatra naggeyyā ca muṇḍeyyā ca pāvaḷanipphoṭanāya cā”ti.
sn41:9.1.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, citto gahapati acelaṁ kassapaṁ etadavoca:
sn41:9.1.11_0: Dhammassa svākkhātatā yatra hi nāma tiṁsamattehi vassehi na koci uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato abhavissa phāsuvihāro,
sn41:9.1.11_1: aññatra naggeyyā ca muṇḍeyyā ca pāvaḷanipphoṭanāya cā”ti.
sn41:9.2.2_0: “Mayhampi kho pana, bhante, tiṁsamattāni vassāni upāsakattaṁ upagatassā”ti.
sn41:9.2.3_1: tiṁsamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?
sn41:9.2.5_2: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:9.2.6_0: Ahañhi, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā … dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:9.2.7_0: Ahañhi, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:9.2.8_0: Ahañhi, bhante, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn41:9.2.9_2: anacchariyaṁ kho panetaṁ yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evaṁ byākareyya:
sn41:9.2.10_0: ‘natthi taṁ saṁyojanaṁ yena saṁyojanena saṁyutto citto gahapati puna imaṁ lokaṁ āgaccheyyā’”ti.
sn41:9.2.11_0: Evaṁ vutte, acelo kassapo cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
sn41:9.2.13_1: yatra hi nāma gihī odātavasano evarūpaṁ uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ adhigamissati phāsuvihāraṁ.
sn41:9.2.14_0: Labheyyāhaṁ, gahapati, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
sn41:9.3.1_0: Atha kho citto gahapati acelaṁ kassapaṁ ādāya yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41:9.3.5_0: Alattha kho acelo kassapo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
sn41:9.3.6_0: Acirūpasampanno ca panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
sn41:9.3.6_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn41:9.3.7_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn41:9.3.8_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā kassapo arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn41:10.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena citto gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn41:10.1.2_0: Atha kho sambahulā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā saṅgamma samāgamma cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn41:10.2.1_1: citto gahapati tā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā etadavoca:
sn41:10.2.2_0: “tampi aniccaṁ, tampi addhuvaṁ, tampi pahāya gamanīyan”ti.
sn41:10.2.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, cittassa gahapatino mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn41:10.2.5_0: “Kiṁ tāhaṁ vadāmi yaṁ maṁ tumhe evaṁ vadetha:
sn41:10.2.8_0: ‘tampi aniccaṁ, tampi addhuvaṁ, tampi pahāya gamanīyan’”ti.
sn41:10.2.9_0: “Tathā hi pana maṁ ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā evamāhaṁsu:
sn41:10.2.13_2: ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā atthavasaṁ sampassamānā evamāhaṁsu:
sn41:10.2.15_0: “Tāsaṁ kho ārāmadevatānaṁ vanadevatānaṁ rukkhadevatānaṁ osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthānaṁ devatānaṁ evaṁ hoti:
sn41:10.2.18_2: sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā dhammiko dhammikaṁ phalaṁ anupassatī’ti.
sn41:10.2.19_0: Imaṁ kho tā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā atthavasaṁ sampassamānā evamāhaṁsu:
sn41:10.2.22_0: ‘tampi aniccaṁ, tampi addhuvaṁ, tampi pahāya gamanīyan’”ti.
sn41:10.3.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn41:10.3.6_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
sn41:10.3.8_4: yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
sn41:10.3.9_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci kule deyyadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ appaṭivibhattaṁ bhavissati sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehīti evañhi vo sikkhitabban”ti.
sn41:10.3.10_0: Atha kho citto gahapati mittāmacce ñātisālohite buddhe ca dhamme ca saṅghe ca cāge ca samādapetvā kālamakāsīti.
